title: Frost on my Pillow
description: Librarian Note: See Alternate Cover Edition HERE.One girl, one voice, one magical charm that could change the universe if it falls into the wrong hands…  One boy who will do anything to protect her, even if that means laying down his own life to keep the demons away…  One love that’s sure to show in the stars… She’s Fire, he’s Ice.
author: Leah Hamrick
